channel.title: Can I do these things? [PI]
channel.description:
Ok well I'm using Hybrid PVP V3 which is PI and I was wondering if I could do these things-
1. Make it fullscreen (optional feature on the client) 2. Do a Jframe like the real RS (Sorta see through) 3. Add castle wars and clan wars 4. Add bank tabs
I know a 614 probably has all these features BUT
1. I've learnt to code 525 PI quite well and have no idea how to code 614 2. When I try to run a 614 client it doesn't work and gets stuck at 0% loading
I Just want to know if these things are possible. If someone is 100% about wether they are possible or not I will give rep++. If someone could link me to a tut for ANY of those 3 things that would be awesome! Also probably the minigames and bank tabs are my top priorities.

item.title: Can I do these things? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

All are 100% possible but everything you listed besides castle wars will require editing in the client as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I do these things? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

All of these are possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I do these things? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Im 100% that you can do fullscreen and add bank tabs but im not sure on others u mentioned

Btw, read my pm pls!!

Read full topic

item.title: Can I do these things? [PI]

item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

Ok well I’m using Hybrid PVP V3 which is PI and I was wondering if I could do these things-

  1. Make it fullscreen (optional feature on the client)
  2. Do a Jframe like the real RS (Sorta see through)
  3. Add castle wars and clan wars
  4. Add bank tabs

I know a 614 probably has all these features BUT

  1. I’ve learnt to code 525 PI quite well and have no idea how to code 614
  2. When I try to run a 614 client it doesn’t work and gets stuck at 0% loading

I Just want to know if these things are possible. If someone is 100% about wether they are possible or not I will give rep++. If someone could link me to a tut for ANY of those 3 things that would be awesome! Also probably the minigames and bank tabs are my top priorities.
